attributes.action: scrap universal credit stop the poorer being discriminated and facing poverty
attributes.additional_details: where universal credit has already been rolled out it is proven that claimants are in at least £600 rent arrears while waiting for 6 weeks before payment is made make the payments weekly at least or a benefit that is fair
attributes.background: proven that universal credit is not working with people being in severe rent arrears and suffering poverty while waiting for first payments make a benefit that is paid weekly justifiable and fair instead of discriminating against the poor
